items.summary: Fix the celebration-state inline photo loading so that both static images at `/assets/generated/valentine-photo-1.jpg` and `/assets/generated/valentine-photo-2.jpg` reliably render after clicking YES, instead of showing the fallback text "Photo could not be loaded".

Harden static asset URL handling for the celebration photos so the image `src` works correctly when the app is served from a non-root base path (e.g., behind a gateway or under a subdirectory), without changing the filenames or the inline layout.

Improve the `CelebrationPhoto` componentâ€™s reliability: ensure it resets its error/loading state when `src` changes, and provide a graceful retry-friendly rendering path so transient decode/load issues do not permanently lock the component into the fallback state.
